verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that, <S%G1722>while<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%> was <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2882>Corinth,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> having <S%G1330>passed<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> the <S%G510>upper<s%> <S%G3313>coasts<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2181>Ephesus:<s%> and <S%G2147>finding<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

He <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G2076>Have<s%> you <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> since you <S%G4100>believed?<s%> And they <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, We <S%G2076>have<s%> not <S%G3761>so<s%> <S%G3761>much<s%> as <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> there be any <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, To <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> were you <S%G907>baptized?<s%> And they <S%G2036>said,<s%> To <S%G2491>John's<s%> <S%G908>baptism.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G2992>people,<s%> that they should <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> him which should <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> him, that is, <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
When they <S%G191>heard<s%> this, they were <S%G907>baptized<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> on them, the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> them; and they <S%G2980>spoke<s%> with <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> and <S%G4395>prophesied.<s%>
And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G435>men<s%> were <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G1177>twelve.<s%>

And he <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> and <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3955>boldly<s%> for the <S%G1909>space<s%> of <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3376>months,<s%> <S%G1256>disputing<s%> and <S%G3982>persuading<s%> the things <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G5100>divers<s%> were <S%G4645>hardened,<s%> and <S%G544>believed<s%> not, but <S%G2551>spoke<s%> evil of that <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude,<s%> he <S%G868>departed<s%> from them, and <S%G873>separated<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1256>disputing<s%> <S%G2596>daily<s%> <S%G2250><s%> in the <S%G4981>school<s%> of <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G5181>Tyrannus.<s%>

And <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1096>continued<s%> by the <S%G1909>space<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2094>years;<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> they which <S%G2730>dwelled<s%> in <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and <S%G1672>Greeks.<s%>
And <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4160>worked<s%> <S%G3756>special<s%> <S%G1411>miracles<s%> by the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G3972>Paul:<s%>

<S%G5620>So<s%> that from his <S%G5559>body<s%> were <S%G2018>brought<s%> to the <S%G770>sick<s%> <S%G4676>handkerchiefs<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4612>aprons,<s%> and the <S%G3554>diseases<s%> <S%G525>departed<s%> from them, and the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out of them.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G4022>vagabond<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G1845>exorcists,<s%> <S%G2021>took<s%> on them to <S%G3687>call<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them which <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>LORD<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> We <S%G3726>adjure<s%> you by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2784>preaches.<s%>
And there were <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of one <S%G4630>Sceva,<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> and <S%G749>chief<s%> of the <S%G749>priests,<s%> which <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5124>so.<s%>

And the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> I <S%G1097>know,<s%> and <S%G3972>Paul<s%> I <S%G1987>know;<s%> but <S%G5101>who<s%> are you?

And the <S%G444>man<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> was <S%G2177>leaped<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> them, and <S%G2634>overcame<s%> them, and <S%G2480>prevailed<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> them, <S%G5620>so<s%> that they <S%G1628>fled<s%> out of that <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G1131>naked<s%> and <S%G5135>wounded.<s%>

And <S%G5124>this<s%> was <S%G1110>known<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2730>dwelling<s%> at <S%G2181>Ephesus;<s%> and <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> them <S%G3956>all,<s%> and the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G3170>magnified.<s%>
And <S%G4183>many<s%> that <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and <S%G1843>confessed,<s%> and <S%G312>showed<s%> their <S%G4234>deeds.<s%>

<S%G2425>Many<s%> of them <S%G1161>also<s%> which <S%G4238>used<s%> <S%G4021>curious<s%> <S%G4021>arts<s%> <S%G4851>brought<s%> their <S%G976>books<s%> <S%G4851>together,<s%> and <S%G2618>burned<s%> them <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men: and they <S%G4860>counted<s%> the <S%G5092>price<s%> of them, and <S%G2147>found<s%> it <S%G4002>fifty<s%> <S%G3461><s%> <S%G3461>thousand<s%> pieces of <S%G694>silver.<s%>
<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2596>mightily<s%> <S%G2904><s%> <S%G837>grew<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2962>God<s%> and <S%G2480>prevailed.<s%>

<S%G5613>After<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things were <S%G4137>ended,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5087>purposed<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> when he had <S%G1330>passed<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> and <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> <S%G3326>After<s%> I have <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> I <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4516>Rome.<s%>

So he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of them that <S%G1247>ministered<s%> to him, <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%> and <S%G2037>Erastus;<s%> but he <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G1907>stayed<s%> in <S%G773>Asia<s%> for a <S%G5550>season.<s%>
And the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3641>small<s%> <S%G5017>stir<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> that <S%G3598>way.<s%>

For a <S%G5100>certain<s%> man <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1216>Demetrius,<s%> a <S%G695>silversmith,<s%> which <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G693>silver<s%> <S%G3485>shrines<s%> for <S%G735>Diana,<s%> <S%G3930>brought<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3641>small<s%> <S%G2039>gain<s%> to the <S%G5079>craftsmen;<s%>

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> he <S%G4867>called<s%> <S%G4867>together<s%> with the <S%G2040>workmen<s%> of <S%G5108>like<s%> <S%G5078>occupation,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G435>Sirs,<s%> you <S%G1987>know<s%> that by <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G2039>craft<s%> we <S%G2076>have<s%> our <S%G2142>wealth.<s%>

<S%G2532>Moreover<s%> you <S%G2334>see<s%> and <S%G191>hear,<s%> that not <S%G3440>alone<s%> at <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> but <S%G4975>almost<s%> throughout <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G773>Asia,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> has <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> and <S%G3179>turned<s%> <S%G3179>away<s%> <S%G2425>much<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that they be <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2316>gods,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1096>made<s%> with <S%G5495>hands:<s%>

So that not <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> our <S%G3313>craft<s%> is in <S%G2793>danger<s%> to be <S%G2064>set<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G557>nothing;<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> that the <S%G2411>temple<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2299>goddess<s%> <S%G735>Diana<s%> should be <S%G1519>despised,<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3049><s%> and her <S%G3168>magnificence<s%> <S%G3195>should<s%> be <S%G2507>destroyed,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%> and the <S%G3625>world<s%> <S%G4576>worships.<s%>

And when they <S%G191>heard<s%> these sayings, they were <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G2372>wrath,<s%> and <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3173>Great<s%> is <S%G735>Diana<s%> of the <S%G2180>Ephesians.<s%>

And the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G4130>filled<s%> with <S%G4799>confusion:<s%> and having <S%G4884>caught<s%> <S%G1050>Gaius<s%> and <S%G708>Aristarchus,<s%> men of <S%G3110>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul's<s%> <S%G4898>companions<s%> in <S%G4898>travel,<s%> they <S%G3729>rushed<s%> with <S%G3661>one<s%> <S%G3661>accord<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2302>theatre.<s%>
And when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> would <S%G1014>have<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> in to the <S%G1218>people,<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1439>suffered<s%> him not.

And <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G775>chief<s%> of <S%G775>Asia,<s%> which were his <S%G5384>friends,<s%> <S%G3992>sent<s%> to him, <S%G3870>desiring<s%> him that he would not <S%G1325>adventure<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2302>theatre.<s%>

<S%G243>Some<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> <S%G3303>one<s%> thing, and <S%G243>some<s%> <S%G243>another:<s%> for the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> was <S%G4797>confused:<s%> and the <S%G4119>more<s%> part <S%G1492>knew<s%> not <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G1752><s%> they were <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4897>together.<s%>

And they <S%G4264>drew<s%> <S%G223>Alexander<s%> out of the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4261>putting<s%> him <S%G4261>forward.<s%> And <S%G223>Alexander<s%> <S%G2678>beckoned<s%> with the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G2309>would<s%> have <S%G626>made<s%> his <S%G626>defense<s%> to the <S%G1218>people.<s%>

But when they <S%G1921>knew<s%> that he was a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> with <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> the <S%G1909>space<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5610>hours<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, <S%G3173>Great<s%> is <S%G735>Diana<s%> of the <S%G2180>Ephesians.<s%>

And when the town <S%G1122>clerk<s%> had <S%G2687>appeased<s%> the <S%G3793>people,<s%> he <S%G5346>said,<s%> You <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> is there that <S%G1097>knows<s%> not how that the <S%G4172>city<s%> of the <S%G2180>Ephesians<s%> is a <S%G3511>worshipper<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2299>goddess<s%> <S%G735>Diana,<s%> and of the image which <S%G1356>fell<s%> down from <S%G1356>Jupiter?<s%>

Seeing <S%G3767>then<s%> that <S%G5130>these<s%> things <S%G368>cannot<s%> be <S%G369>spoken<s%> <S%G368>against,<s%> you <S%G1163>ought<s%> to be <S%G2687>quiet,<s%> and to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G4312>rashly.<s%>

For you have <S%G71>brought<s%> here <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G435>men,<s%> which are <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G2417>robbers<s%> of <S%G2417>churches,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> yet <S%G987>blasphemers<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2299>goddess.<s%>

<S%G3303>Why<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1216>Demetrius,<s%> and the <S%G5079>craftsmen<s%> which are with him, <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3056>matter<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man, the <S%G60>law<s%> is <S%G71>open,<s%> and there are <S%G446>deputies:<s%> let them <S%G1458>accuse<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G1934>inquire<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> matters, it shall be <S%G1956>determined<s%> in a <S%G1772>lawful<s%> <S%G1577>assembly.<s%>

For we are in <S%G2793>danger<s%> to be <S%G1458>called<s%> in <S%G1458>question<s%> for <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day's<s%> <S%G4714>uproar,<s%> there <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G158>cause<s%> <S%G4012>whereby<s%> <S%G3757><s%> we <S%G1410>may<s%> <S%G591>give<s%> an <S%G3056>account<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4963>concourse.<s%>
And when he had <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken,<s%> he <S%G630>dismissed<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly.<s%>
